attributes.action: Remove laws allowing any citizen adversely affected by vaccination to sue
attributes.additional_details: Citizens that have been adversely affected by vaccination, some with life changing affects, should have the right to be compensated for the pain and suffering this causes. It is unlawful to allow these companies the level of protection that they have been granted
attributes.background: Completely remove laws and mandates allowing any citizen to freely start legal proceedings against companies that have created and supplied vaccinations

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what laws you'd like to be changed.  You might like to know that the Government provides a vaccine damage payment for people harmed by vaccines:

https://www.gov.uk/vaccine-damage-payment/eligibility

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
